name: CrushingMotherhoodMinuteFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Crushing Motherhood Minute is a daily show where I share tips and tools for corporate moms who want to move out of survival mode and back into high performance & achievement they’re used to.

Specifically, I share daily practical tips related to crushing career, family, and personal goals with tips like
Navigating corporate politics
Leadership
Time management
Self identity
Career path
Goal getting
And….all while keeping it real (because I can be a hot mess too!)
Crushing Motherhood Minute covers strategies ranging from meal planning to difficult bosses and everything in between.

My goal is to be your go-to source for the tips you need to be your very best.

Check out crushingmotherhood.com for the motherload of free resources on these topics.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
